Title: distinctJSONPathsAndTypes
Description: Calculates the list of distinct paths and their types stored in JSON column.
The sorted map of paths and types Map(String, Array(String)).
Examples: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS test_json;CREATE TABLE test_json(json JSON) ENGINE = Memory;INSERT INTO test_json VALUES ('{"a" : 42, "b" : "Hello"}'), ('{"b" : [1, 2, 3], "c" : {"d" : {"e" : "2020-01-01"}}}'), ('{"a" : 43, "c" : {"d" : {"f" : [{"g" : 42}]}}}')
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS test_json;CREATE TABLE test_json(json JSON(a UInt32)) ENGINE = Memory;INSERT INTO test_json VALUES ('{"b" : "Hello"}'), ('{"b" : "World", "c" : [1, 2, 3]}');
